scripts.db:up: dotenv -e .env -- docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml -f infra/docker-compose.data.yml up -d --remove-orphans postgres minio nats
scripts.db:down: dotenv -e .env -- docker compose -f infra/docker-compose.yml -f infra/docker-compose.data.yml down --remove-orphans
scripts.migrate: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter @platform/cdm exec -- prisma migrate dev --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:deploy: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter @platform/cdm exec -- prisma migrate deploy --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.migrate:status: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter @platform/cdm exec -- prisma migrate status --schema prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:generate: dotenv -e .env -- pnpm --filter @platform/cdm exec -- prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma
